title: Strengthening Leadership Practice Competencies: Design Process for Developing Virtual Training Based on ISO 10015

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Explain systematic methods for analyzing educational needs in accordance with ISO 10015 standards.
Design effective virtual training curricula in online environments.
Measure training implementation outcomes through project-based assessments and propose improvement strategies.
Establish strategies for managing large learner groups across diverse technological environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
